pullrequest.title: Fix OS Specific initialization in CMakeLists.txt

content.raw:
Note that in all other Gazebo/ignition projects the equivalent lines of code are (see [1] and [2]):
~~~

#################################################
# OS Specific initialization
if (UNIX)
  ign_setup_unix()
else (WIN32)
  ign_setup_windows()
endif()

if(APPLE)
  ign_setup_apple()
endif()
~~~


I avoided this version due to the mismatch in the `if(UNIX)/else(WIN32)` clause, that induces to think that the else is actually an elseif. 

[1] :https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/6dd255678a6cd736f6118a6cfbb73d825826cd3f/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-198

[2] : https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/42215f2019f5ae64fc8a0610ef804a0fc53b0740/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-258
